A3JGroups

Class MessageDelete

  • java.lang.Object
    • A3JGroups.MessageDelete
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MessageDelete
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    MessageDelete is a Thread used by the supervisor in an automatic way to manage messages stored in the ReplicatedHashMap. You have to define the waitTime (30000ms as default) which is updated.
    Author:
    bett.marco88@gmail.com
